name: Station Assault
description:
My entry to the Bullet Hell jam. Had something like this in mind for a long time and it was finally time to do something about it!

Simple premise, use WASD to move, mouse to aim, R to reload and 1-5 to switch weapons. Kill enemies, find keycards and fight the boss!

Only one level, but it's an intense one.

You might need to alt+f4 to exit the game, I forgot about this one :x

The additional archive is a list of all the big builds I did during the 7 day of making this game for anyone interested!
